title: Manidhi Lyrics Iraivi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Manidhi Song Lyrics Iraivi
Singer(s): Brinda, Ananthu & Santhosh Narayanan
Lyrics: Vivek

Ulagam unadhaai varaivaai 
manidhi manidhi
veliye vaa

manithan endra
sollukullae 
adangaadhe pennae

uyaram unadhaethaan
amarndhaal uyaram
theriyaadhu nee
nimirndhae vaa pennae

manidhi veliye vaa
manidhi veliye vaa
veliye vaa

koondai kothi paar
adhu thirakkum
siragai neeti paar
seetedukkadhe evanukkum (2)

Manidhi veliye vaa
manidhi veliye vaa
Manidhi veliye vaa
manidhi veliye vaa

yaaro vandhu
suthandhiram kodukka
neeyo adimai illayadi

un mandhil
un sudhandhiram undu
neeye unarndhu kandupudi
manidhi veliye vaa

manidhi manidhi
neeye un sirai
unnidam irundhae
valathu kaal vaithu
veliye vaa

manidhi veliye vaa

manithan endra
sollukullae 
adangaadhe pennae

uyaram unadhaethaan
amarndhaal uyaram
theriyaadhu nee
nimirndhae vaa pennae

manidhi veliye vaa
manidhi veliye vaa
veliye vaa

koondai kothi paar
adhu thirakkum
siragai neeti paar
seetedukkadhe evanukkum (2)

aindhu vayadhu pinji pennai
nasukkum kaamugan ingundu
arai kurai aadai kaaranma ?
andha sisuvayum
selayil moodanuma ?
thandhira ulagam idhu
gavani

aanukku thaaipaal
surandhidum kaambil
unaku kallipaal
kasindhidum kanmani
